channel.title: Manual on Vulkanon

item.title: Buttons
item.description: Main Menu Button Function A Choose B Cancel Control Pad Move cursor In Game Button Function A, B Shot L, R Laser Select Back to Main Menu Control Pad Move

item.title: Playing the game
item.description: Defeat the boss within three minutes time limits. Laser Laser destroys all enemy bullets. You can use Laser when Power is 100%. Enemy Bullets Suicide Bullets and Aimed Suicide Bullets are generated when you shot Destroyable Bullet. Image Type Destroyable Bullet Suicide Bullet Aimed Suicide Bullet
